paramInformation.label: Numbers of clicks to control the load
Value used for devices belonging to Group 2
paramInformation.description: Value sent when the external switch receives 1 click. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: Value used for devices belonging to Group 3
paramInformation.description: Value sent when the external switch receives 2 clicks. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: Value used for devices belonging to Group 4
paramInformation.description: Value sent when external switch receives 3 clicks. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: Timer to switch OFF the Relay
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the relay is switched OFF

paramInformation.label: Timer to switch ON the Relay
paramInformation.description: Defines the time after which the relay is switched ON

paramInformation.label: Timer scale
paramInformation.description: Defines the time unit used for parameters No.10 and No.11.

paramInformation.label: One Click Scene Activation Set
paramInformation.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 1 Click

paramInformation.label: Two Clicks Scene Activation Set
paramInformation.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 2 Clicks

paramInformation.label: Three Clicks Scene Activation Set
paramInformation.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 3 Clicks

paramInformation.label: Start-up Status
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the device following a restart

paramInformation.label: Type of external switch
paramInformation.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device
